tool_description: Generates customized informed consent forms based on protocol details, regulatory requirements, and site-specific information for clinical trial participation.

study_objectives.description: Primary and secondary study objectives description

intervention_details.description: Description of study interventions, drugs, or procedures

risks_and_benefits.description: Known risks and potential benefits of participation

principal_investigator.description: Name and credentials of the principal investigator

site_contact_info.description: Site contact information for questions or emergencies

language.description: Language for consent form (english, spanish, french)

error_messages: Missing required content: All required protocol information fields must be non-empty.
Invalid language selection: language must be one of [english, spanish, french].
Invalid reading level: reading_level must be one of [elementary, middle_school, high_school].
Content validation failed: One or more required sections lack sufficient detail for consent form generation.
usage: Provide all required protocol and site information. Optionally specify regulatory requirements, language, and reading level. The tool generates a compliant informed consent document.

consent_document.description: Complete formatted informed consent document text

document_sections.description: List of included consent form sections

compliance_status.description: Regulatory compliance assessment of generated document

readability_score.description: Assessed reading level of the generated consent form

word_count.description: Total word count of the consent document
